name: perl-template-toolkit

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Template - Front-end module to the Template Toolkit.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-appconfig
dependencies.description:
AppConfig - Perl5 module for reading configuration files and parsing
command line arguments.

dependencies.name: perl-extutils-makemaker
dependencies.description:
ExtUtils::MakeMaker - Create a module Makefile. This utility is designed
to write a Makefile for an extension module from a Makefile.PL. It is
based on the Makefile.SH model provided by Andy Dougherty and the
perl5-porters.

dependencies.name: perl-file-temp
dependencies.description: File::Temp - return name and handle of a temporary file safely.

dependencies.name: perl-pathtools
dependencies.description: File::Spec - portably perform operations on file names.

dependencies.name: perl-test-leaktrace
dependencies.description:
Test::LeakTrace provides several functions that trace memory leaks. This
module scans arenas, the memory allocation system, so it can detect any
leaked SVs in given blocks.
